concept.title: 1553.232-74 EPA Form 1900-10, Contractor's Cumulative Claim and Reconciliation.

conbody.p: As prescribed in 1532.170(a), the EPA Form 1900-10 shall be used for an accounting of the cumulative charges and costs for cost-reimbursement contracts from the inception of the contract to completion. It shall be submitted by the Contractor along with the completion voucher.
